# Library set up
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(GenomicRanges)
library(tidyverse)
library(plyranges)
library(Rsubread)
```

# Load per sample peak from MACS2
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
normal1_peak <- readr::read_tsv("Data/bcbio_output/raw/WT_tumor_rep1-NF_peaks.narrowPeak", col_names=c("seqnames", "start", "end", "name", "score", "strand", "signalValue", "-log10(pValue)", "-log10(qValue)", "peak")) %>% select(-strand) %>%
  as_granges()

normal2_peak <- readr::read_tsv("Data/bcbio_output/raw/WT_tumor_rep2-NF_peaks.narrowPeak", col_names=c("seqnames", "start", "end", "name", "score", "strand", "signalValue", "-log10(pValue)", "-log10(qValue)", "peak")) %>% select(-strand) %>%
  as_granges()

normal3_peak <- readr::read_tsv("Data/bcbio_output/raw/WT_tumor_rep3-NF_peaks.narrowPeak", col_names=c("seqnames", "start", "end", "name", "score", "strand", "signalValue", "-log10(pValue)", "-log10(qValue)", "peak")) %>% select(-strand) %>%
  as_granges()

kras1_peak <- readr::read_tsv("Data/bcbio_output/raw/Kras_tumor_rep1-NF_peaks.narrowPeak", col_names=c("seqnames", "start", "end", "name", "score", "strand", "signalValue", "-log10(pValue)", "-log10(qValue)", "peak")) %>% select(-strand) %>%
  as_granges()

kras2_peak <- readr::read_tsv("Data/bcbio_output/raw/Kras_tumor_rep2-NF_peaks.narrowPeak", col_names=c("seqnames", "start", "end", "name", "score", "strand", "signalValue", "-log10(pValue)", "-log10(qValue)", "peak")) %>% select(-strand) %>%

kras3_peak <- readr::read_tsv("Data/bcbio_output/raw/Kras_tumor_rep3-NF_peaks.narrowPeak", col_names=c("seqnames", "start", "end", "name", "score", "strand", "signalValue", "-log10(pValue)", "-log10(qValue)", "peak")) %>% select(-strand) %>%
  as_granges()
```

# Merge peaks
Based on the paper, peaks within 500bp of each other were all combined.
```{r}
merged_peaks <- c(normal1_peak, normal2_peak, normal3_peak, kras1_peak, kras2_peak, kras3_peak) %>% GenomicRanges::reduce(min.gapwidth = 500)

merged_peaks$id <- paste0(seqnames(merged_peaks), ":", start(merged_peaks), "-", end(merged_peaks))

# write out a BED file of the merged peaks
rtracklayer::export(merged_peaks, "Data/bcbio_output/merged/merged.bed")
```

# Read counts in peaks
```{r}
# prepare annotation file for featureCount
merged_peaks_df <- as.data.frame(merged_peaks) %>%
    dplyr::select(GeneID = id, Chr = seqnames,
                  Start = start, End = end, Strand = strand)

# load BAM files
bam <- list.files("Data/bcbio_output/raw", pattern=".bam$", full.names = TRUE)
bam <- bam[c(4:6,1:3)]
basename(bam)
sample_name <- c(paste0("normal_crc_rep", seq(1:3)), paste0("kras_crc_rep", seq(1:3)))
print(sample_name)

# featureCount
peak.count <-
    featureCounts(bam, annot.ext = merged_peaks_df,
                  isPairedEnd = TRUE, minOverlap = 1, nthreads = 14, strandSpecific = 0)

peak.count <- peak.count$counts
colnames(peak.count) <- sample_name
peak.count <- as.data.frame(peak.count) %>% rownames_to_column(var = "id")
write_tsv(as.data.frame(peak.count), "Data/bcbio_output/merged/merged-counts.tsv")
```
